title: Welcome to Our Biotech News Platform
excerpt: This is our first article showcasing the new content management system.
content:
Welcome to the Future of Biotech News

This article demonstrates our new content management system built with Next.js and a custom database.

Features include:

  • Rich text editing
  • Image uploads
  • Category management
  • Tag system
  • Draft and publish workflow
author: Nurtal Editorial

title: AI-Powered Drug Discovery Breakthrough
excerpt: Researchers announce major breakthrough in using artificial intelligence for accelerated drug discovery processes.
content:
Revolutionary AI Drug Discovery

A team of researchers has developed a groundbreaking AI system that can predict molecular behavior with unprecedented accuracy.

Key Findings

The system reduces drug discovery timelines from years to months by:

  • Analyzing millions of molecular combinations
  • Predicting side effects before clinical trials
  • Optimizing drug compounds automatically

This breakthrough could revolutionize how we approach pharmaceutical research and development.
author: Dr. Sarah Chen
